githubInfo.readme:
doobie is a pure functional JDBC layer for Scala.

Please proceed to the microsite for more information.

Reporting a bug or need help?

Use doobie_quick_start which should make it easy to reproduce your issue!

Community

You can find our community on

  • Github discussion,
  • Typelevel Discord (#doobie channel)

People are expected to follow the Scala Code of Conduct when discussing Doobie on GitHub, Discord, or other venues.
